Description:
IMMEDIATE PARK FRONTAGE
One of the fortunate few properties in Inner Northern Melbourne with immediate park frontage to Yarra River precinct parklands, this
two level, three bedroom home boasts expansive views to the East from living and terrace areas. Other features include open plan living, study, ground floor courtyard with immediate access to the park, double garage and more. Offered in excellent condition with further cosmetic improvement potential. See it!
Note: No body corporate

Description:
CITY-EDGE SANCTUARY OF SPACE AND ELEGANCE
Immediately captivating with its Victorian elegance and unmatched location, this grand balconied terrace offers an impressively versatile and well-appointed family-focused lifestyle. Behind its iron-fenced cottage garden and imposing Hawthorn-brick faade, the homes expansive floorplan highlights three upstairs bedrooms (including huge master), central bathroom and front balcony to admire the stunning city views. Downstairs: formal lounge/fourth bedroom, second bathroom, separate sitting/living room with private courtyard, light-filled dining area through to the stylish timber kitchen with Smeg/Miele appliances and large butler's pantry. Stand-out features include high ornate ceilings and polished timber floors, authentic open fireplaces, under-stair storeroom, alarm system. Outside, be greeted by a delightfully private entertaining area covered by a lush grape vine-draped pergola, deep north-facing backyard complete with studio/storeroom, working veggie gardens and secure off-street parking via rollerdoor (remote) to ROW. A sensational lifestyle opportunity in a fabulous inner neighbourhood close to Clifton Hill Station, Queens Parade cafes and trams, Quarries Park and Yarra trails.
For further information, please visit www.38ramsdenst.com
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Affordable Clifton Hill
Move straight in and enjoy the life-style offered by this charming Victorian cottage or take advantage of the opportunity to refurbish or renovate at your leisure.
Warm and welcoming accommodation comprises arched entry hall, two bedrooms, living room with adjacent kitchen and bathroom. The allotment of 143 square metres (approx) provides lots of potential and a generous sunny brick paved courtyard with easy roller door access for parking.
You will also love the location with Clifton Hill shops, transport and a host of other amenities all within easy reach. This is an affordable opportunity to enter the highly sought after Clifton Hill market. First home buyers and investors must inspect!
Peter Bennett : 0419 502 466

Description:
So Central, So Easy, So Much to Enjoy
A fabulous inner-city lifestyle comes to you with this delightful Victorian end terrace
where the area's attractions are all located within easy reach. Seconds to the Darling Gardens, Queens Parade's cafes and shops, trams, schools and just a few minutes' walk to Clifton Hill station; enjoy it all at your leisure from this charming Hawthorn brick and slate roof end terrace brimming with period character flowing through updated spaces to a private north-facing rear courtyard garden. Hydronic heating, air-conditioner and classical ceilings feature in a comfortable, bright interior including arched hall, two double bedrooms (marble open fireplace), living room (open fireplace), large dining area, kitchen with dishwasher, central bathroom, separate laundry and ROW for potential off street parking. Take it further, as far as you like when ready, and in the meantime, enjoy!
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978

Description:
Commercial Freehold Investment.. Auction This Wednesday 27th at 2.00pm View from
This Victorian freehold has been in the same family for many years and is located in a vibrant shopping strip where few sales take place and ever fewer rental vacancies.
Built over two levels and occupied as a cafe/restaurant and dwelling on a 3 year lease commencing May 2011 with current rental of $36,500p.a. approx.
There has been various refurbishment works undertaken in recent years yet the building possesses the potential for more capital investment and improvement.
A rear laneway provides rear access .
A great opportunity to invest in this thriving locality with a great deal of upside in the future.

Description:
CLEAN-EDGED THREE BEDROOM STYLE
Looking for more space than the average Victorian terrace offers? This free standing contemporary residence, designed for low-maintenance living and with a large north-facing garden, demands your inspection! Set back from the street, the house is entered from a landscaped garden adjoining a covered parking area, with additional off-street parking. A well-proportioned living room overlooking the garden leads through to the kitchen, equipped with generous storage and stainless steel appliances; the kitchen is open to a pleasant informal living and dining room, flowing through a wall of glass to a covered patio and courtyard garden, with enclosed drying area. Also on the lower level are a full-sized laundry and separate WC. Upstairs are three bedrooms, a family bathroom and powder room. The main bedroom includes an ensuite bathroom, and opens to a large private terrace with CBD views. This light-filled property features parquetry floors, generous storage, split-system air conditioning and panel heating - all this just minutes from transport, Village cafes and freeway access.

Description:
City Fringe Pad Set To Entertain
Do you always find yourself wishing for more hours in the day?
Cut your commute dramatically, reclaim your schedule and situate yourself to make the most out of your time by taking advantage of this beautifully converted three bedroom plus study residence within easy reach of the CBD.
Entertain in style thanks to an entertainers' courtyard with a large deck, plus a private balcony.
The open living/dining/quality kitchen showcases stone surfaces and stainless steel appliances, two of three bedrooms come with walk-in robes, and dual bathrooms include a spa ensuite.
Extras: European laundry, ducted heating, split system cooling, intercom and electronic garage with direct internal entry.
Stroll to trains, buses, Darling Gardens and parks, with various schools, shops and cafes nearby.
Photo ID Required
Anthony De Iesi : 0407 803 501

Address: Rear 497a Hoddle Street CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068
Description:
Hidden Gem Seconds to Darling Gardens
A whisper quiet rear position fronting an easy access laneway enhances the incredible convenience, peace and privacy offered by this excellent modern townhouse. Privately tucked away near Darling Gardens, Queens Parade, leisure centre/pool and train station; security video intercom and remote-control garage (internal) complement the large proportions, natural light and fabulous quality of this impressive low-maintenance home overlooking a north-facing courtyard garden. A low-upkeep investment or occupier opportunity close to everything, be surprised by the size and serenity of this stylish home including two spacious bedrooms, 2.7m ceilings, great storage, light-filled living/dining room, kitchen with European stainless-steel appliances, bathroom and two WCs, laundry, reverse-cycle air-conditioning, polished hardwood floors and data/Foxtel points.

Description:
Substantial Inner City Family Home
A leafy and secluded north-facing rear garden is the easy-going oasis, entertainment area and preferred entrance to this desirable double-fronted Edwardian on the corner of a quiet cul-de-sac. Close to Clifton Hill primary school, Darling Gardens, Clifton Hill station, aquatic centre and Queens Parade cafes, this freestanding home has superbly evolved to meet family needs with a flexible three bedroom floorplan including large upstairs rumpus/study or possible fourth bedroom. Ideal for an indoor/outdoor inner-city lifestyle, offering separate sitting room/library, open-plan family living and dining area, well equipped kitchen with Ilve and Miele appliances, central bathroom, laundry/2nd wc, ducted gas and slab floor heating, open fireplaces, alarm, high ceilings, polished floorboards, attic storage, paved outdoor area, workshed and rainwater tank. Excellent potential for off street parking from Anderson Street.
Land: 12.2m x 33.5m. approx.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978
Insights: 76 Noone Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2012 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Renovated 2 Bedroom... Facing Fenwick Street...
Located on the ground floor of this well maintained select block of 6 apartments is this beautifully presented and tastefully renovated 2 bedroom which is ready to be enjoyed or provide an excellent rental return with assured capital growth. Fronting onto Fenwick Street with its majestic Plane Trees providing a pleasant outlook the apartment features security entry, 2 bedrooms with built in robes,
spacious open plan living with floating timber floors, renovated kitchen/meals with dishwasher, tiled bathroom with laundry facilities and separate toilet.
With an off street car space on title and of course an envied location walking distance to the delights of the Clifton Hill Village, Queens Parade, Yarra Parklands and a post of public transport options this apartment is certainly worthy of your consideration.
Insights: 2/79 Heidelberg Road, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2012 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Affordable Clifton Hill!
This enchanting Victorian cottage will delight those seeking a relaxed and informal lifestyle. They will enjoy the bright open plan living / dining room opening to the sunny brick paved courtyard, ideal for entertaining. The kitchen is well appointed with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher. Further accommodation comprises main bedroom with ornamental fireplace and built-in-robes, bathroom which includes a separate shower and spa bath, European style laundry, loft style study/bedroom/retreat with roof storage and balcony. Features include warm polished timber floors throughout, ceiling fans and gas heating. The location is ideal. The Yarra Parklands and Dights Falls are just moments away. Trains, trams and busses, the vibrant Queens Parade Shopping precinct and Collingwood Leisure Centre are all with-in easy reach.
Peter Bennett : 0419 502 466
Insights: 14 Groom Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2012 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Victorian Beauty Shining Bright
The picturesque profile of this delightful Victorian reflects a beautifully renovated and presented interior with triple-arched hallway flowing to a sun-filled courtyard garden. An exceptional 'no through' wide street village setting and ROW for potential off-street parking complements a period home of rare lifestyle appeal that's meticulously maintained throughout a light-filled layout including three double bedrooms. Stroll to parklands, trails, train station, schools, shops and cafes from this attractive freestanding home offering sun and starlit living and dining area, stunning Miele kitchen with new bamboo flooring, lovely clawfoot bathroom, laundry, central heating, air-conditioning, open/gas fireplaces, alarm, built-in-robes, attic storage and bifold doors to heritage brick paved alfresco area.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978

Description:
A STATEMENT OF ARCHITECTURAL EXCELLENCE
Featured in a recent issue of Inside Out, this refined residence has been completely rebuilt within its block-fronted Edwardian shell by architect and designer owners Michael and Jodie Branov of Branov Design. The result is a building of considerable distinction, thoughtfully configured for a low-maintenance family lifestyle close to Clifton Hill Village and Yarra Parklands. This is a house which creates a sense of understated drama, as one carefully- zoned space folds out to another. Entry from the wide front garden, planted with heat tolerant species, is to a broad high-ceilinged hallway, from which open an impressive living room with period fireplace, two large bedrooms with quality built-in storage, and a sensational Carrara marble-tiled bathroom, with free-standing sculpted bath, shower and louvred glass to a planted light court. The main bedroom adjoins an ensuite bathroom flooded with light from a second internal courtyard garden. Extensive storage here is crafted from oiled recycled blackbutt, used to striking effect throughout the house. Past a full-size laundry linked to the main bathroom, the house opens out to a spectacular Great Room living and dining zone with shard ceiling window and a study at one end of the kitchen, which is superbly equipped with integrated Miele appliances, a butlers pantry, and black-matt 2PAC joinery. A wall of glass flows out to a terrace and courtyard, overlooking the lawned back garden and a stylish covered parking area and studio/storage space.
Exceptional design features include burnished concrete and Bremworth carpet floor finishes, commercial grade cooling and heating with brushed metal diffusers, double-glazed windows, Rogersellers bathroom detail, and a 5000 litre underground grey water system.
Insights: 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Equally Alluring in Every Aspect
A desirable balance of indoor and outdoor space, period and modern features plus access to parklands and the city ensures this captivating terrace is the ideal fit for a fabulous lifestyle. Semi-detached one of a pair with side rear access, an attractive Boom-style facade precedes a comfortable home of perfect proportions that extends from arched hallway and two double bedrooms (built-in-robes and open fireplaces including main with marble mantelpiece) to two separate living areas with flexibility to configure as desired. A well-appointed kitchen, sizable bathroom with laundry facilities and private rear courtyard in established garden round off an enticing opportunity central to Darling Gardens, Yarra Bend park, train station, pool and nearby cafe/shopping strips. Includes gas heating, polished floorboards and classical ceilings.
Sarah Wood : 0408 902 827

Description:
LIGHT-FILLED, SECLUDED AND CENTRAL
This delightful residence in a restful north-facing garden setting offers comfortable living close to Brunswick Street, Queens Parade and the Edinburgh and Darling Gardens. Incorporating classic design elements an extra-wide hallway, steel window frames, polished floorboards and decorative plasterwork if offers a spacious living room, three double bedrooms, study, neat kitchen/meals (Smeg appliances), tiles bathroom and separate laundry/utility room. With generous outdoor living space, off-street parking and gas heating, this stylish property offers exciting opportunity to add value at a prime city-edge address. Note land size: 375 sq.m. approx.

Description:
ABSOLUTELY IMMACULATE
This comfortable single-fronted Edwardian is picture-perfect, beginning with its charming picket fence and vintage garden blooms, to its detailed restoration of classic period features. Comprises two large bedrooms, each featuring period fireplace, lounge with gas heating, and stylish kitchen complete with quality Lofra oven/cooktop. Other features include security doors throughout, immaculate rear yard and gourmet vegie garden, and potential OSP via rear lane access. This charming terrace is situated on a wide and tree-lined street distinctive to Clifton Hill and offers ample on-street parking. Also in close proximity to public transport, the CBD, schools, and Queens Parade shopping precinct renowned for its unique village atmosphere and specialty shops and cafes. To add to the appeal, this little Edwardian is central to the historic Darling Gardens, Merri Creek bike track, and The Quarries Park, enhancing your lifestyle package with sport and leisure in abundance.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
ABSOLUTELY IMMACULATE
This comfortable single-fronted Edwardian is picture-perfect, beginning with its charming picket fence and vintage garden blooms, to its detailed restoration of classic period features. Comprises two large bedrooms, each featuring period fireplace, lounge with gas heating, and stylish kitchen complete with quality Lofra oven/cooktop. Other features include security doors throughout, immaculate rear yard and gourmet vegie garden, and potential OSP via rear lane access. This charming terrace is situated on a wide and tree-lined street distinctive to Clifton Hill and offers ample on-street parking. Also in close proximity to public transport, the CBD, schools, and Queens Parade shopping precinct renowned for its unique village atmosphere and specialty shops and cafes. To add to the appeal, this little Edwardian is central to the historic Darling Gardens, Merri Creek bike track, and The Quarries Park, enhancing your lifestyle package with sport and leisure in abundance.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
A GREAT PLACE TO START
Beautifully located close to Parkland, transport and the village shops this elevated single fronted terrace presents in sound refurbish condition. Corner aspect provides great natural light; there are 2 generous bedrooms, lounge/living room, kitchen with sep meals area and a bathroom. The rear garden is a good size and has access to O'Grady St. Secure 12 month lease in place.

Description:
Be Inspired!
Got the place, got the position, got the price, got the vision, now get going as this rendered brick Edwardian is ready for you to give it your best! Semi-detached on one of the village's most popular low-traffic streets, this unrenovated home with classic post-war interior is neat and comfortable for investors and entry-level buyers though the main attraction is the amazing potential. Nestled in a walk-anywhere location with cafes, Darling Gardens, train station just around the corner; transform the perfect period proportions with a project to be proud of and fully capitalise on this generous two bedroom home. Also offers good-sized living room, functional gas kitchen, bathroom, laundry, polished floorboards, high ceilings, paved courtyard garden, storage shed and ROW.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978

Description:
DIRECTLY OPPOSITE THE PARK
Boasting and enviable north-facing position, this multi-level home offers maintenance-free convenience opposite picturesque parklands, playing fields and walking/cycling tracks. Ground floor features living zone with central kitchen (and walk-in-pantry), opening to paved courtyard with secure off street parking via roll-a-door. First floor includes 2 bedrooms (BIRs) and a family-sized bathroom with concealed laundry, and the second floor sees a third bedroom (BIRs) with study area and ensuite. Note; No Body Corporate. Agent : Nelson Alexander

Description:
GENUINELY SPACIOUS TOWN RESIDENCE
Premier position located in quiet central location off Groom Street
- 2 double bedrooms - built in robes
- Huge seperate study
- 2 large living zones
- Dining leads to good sized courtyard garden
- Immaculate kitchen - dishwasher; hotplates
- 2 bathrooms - ensuite to main bedroom
- Central main with bath
- Seperate laundry and WC
- Secure remote controlled carport
- Land 6m x 30m approx
- RETURNS $27,000p/a; POTENTIAL TO INCREASE
Moments from the Yarra Bend Parklands and bike paths, Dights Falls, village cafes,
Public transport not to mention walking distance to Johnson Street and vibrant Victoria Street, Smith and Brunswick Streets.
